  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3354</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Literature in the EFL Class</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur in der EFL Kategorie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littérature dans la classe d'EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Literatura na classe de EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Letteratura nel codice categoria di EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνία στην κλάση EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Literatura en la clase de EFL</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this article,which appears in the ETNI magazine RAG, the rationale for content based instuction and sometechniques of using literature as the basis of an EFL class is presented.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">books</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">foreign language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem Artikel der im ETNI Zeitschrift LAPPEN, 
im Grundprinzip für Inhalt gegründetes instuction und in den 
sometechniques des Verwendens der Literatur erscheint, während die 
Grundlage einer EFL Kategorie dargestellt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En cet article, qui paraît dans le CHIFFON de 
magazine d'ETNI, le raisonnement pour l'instuction basé par contenu 
et des sometechniques d'utiliser la littérature pendant que la base 
d'une classe d'EFL est présentée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste artigo, que se publica no PANO do 
compartimento de ETNI, no rationale para o instuction baseado índice 
e em sometechniques de usar a literatura enquanto a base de uma classe
de EFL é apresentada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questo articolo, che è publicato nel PANNO 
dello scomparto di ETNI, la spiegazione razionale per il soddisfare ha
basato il instuction ed i sometechniques di usando la letteratura come
la base di un codice categoria di EFL è presentata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το άρθρο, το οποίο εμφανίζεται στο ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ 
περιοδικών ETNI, η λογική για βασισμένο το στο περιεχόμενο 
instuction και sometechniques της χρησιμοποίησης της 
λογοτεχνίας καθώς η βάση μιας κλάσης EFL παρουσιάζεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este artículo, que aparece en el TRAPO del 
compartimiento de ETNI, el análisis razonado para el instuction 
basado contenido y los sometechniques de usar la literatura mientras 
que la base de una clase de EFL se presenta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bücher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fremdsprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">livres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langue étrangère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">livros</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua extrangeira</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">libri</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lingua straniera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιβλία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ξένη γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">libros</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">idioma extranjero</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
